  • You have some hands-on experience in building ML systems from end to end, including testing, monitoring, scaling, and measuring the impact.
  • You will get extra credits for product development experience in a technology company, familiarity with any cloud systems or experience with regression tasks and complex experimentation.


Experience is great, but what we really look for is drive, intelligence, and integrity. So even if you don’t tick every box, please consider applying if you feel you’re the kind of person described above!

Why you’ll love it here:

  • Play a direct role in shaping the future of mobility.
  • Impact millions of customers and partners in 600+ cities across 50+ countries.
  • Work in fast-moving autonomous teams with some of the smartest people in the world.
  • Accelerate your professional growth with unique career opportunities.
  • Get a rewarding salary and stock option package that lets you focus on doing your best work.
  • Enjoy the flexibility of working in a hybrid mode with a minimum of 2 days in the office each week to foster strong connections and teamwork.
  • Take care of your physical and mental health with our wellness perks.
  • Some perks may differ depending on your location and role.

Title: Head of Data Science (f/m/x)
Description:
Company Description

We are seeking a technically skilled Head of Data Science to join our dynamic Data Science department at AUTO1 Group Technology. As part of our disruptive approach in the used car market, our team leverages advanced machine learning techniques to drive innovation and enhance our platforms and processes. AUTO1 Group is Europe's leading digital automotive platform. We revolutionize the used car market with our well-known brands Autohero, wirkaufendeinauto.de, and AUTO1.com.

Job Description


Drive the development and deployment of impactful machine learning models that deliver business results.
Work closely with Data Science Team Leads to oversee the development of various machine learning topics, ensuring resources are allocated effectively and projects stay on track.
Provide technical expertise and guidance to team members, offering advice on modeling questions and making critical MLOps design choices.
Motivate and inspire team members to reach their maximum potential, attracting and retaining top talent.
Collaborate with stakeholders and partners in the tech department to identify and capitalize on business opportunities.
Advocate best practices in processes, coding standards, and technologies within the data science department.


Qualifications


Proven experience in managing teams or departments, with a focus on technical guidance and mentorship.
Demonstrated track record of generating substantial business impact through successful development and deployment of machine learning models.
Profound knowledge of predictive machine learning models, software engineering practices, and machine learning operations.
Experience or quick adaptability to our tech stack, including Python, AWS services (Step Functions, Glue, Sagemaker & Sagemaker Python SDK, Redshift, etc.), Jenkins, Terraform, FastAPI and SQL.
Strong business understanding and the ability to draw meaningful conclusions from A/B test experiments, providing relevant insights to stakeholders.


Additional Information

Our offer


Colleagues who strive for excellence and utilize the latest technologies. See what we do in our Tech-Blog: https://auto1.tech.
Our dynamic environment offers new challenges for personal growth and encourages the contribution of your own ideas.
More than 100 different nationalities contribute to a truly international and diverse working environment.
30 days of vacation per year.
Educational budget to support your continuous learning and development.
Discounts at Autohero, our platform for high-quality used cars.


Apply by uploading your CV with a note of your earliest starting date.

Contact

Lina Antoniuk

At AUTO1 Group we live an open culture, believe in direct communication, and value diversity. We welcome every applicant; regardless of gender, ethnic origin, religion, age, sexual identity, disability, or any other non-merit factor.

Title: ML / AI Engineer & Startup Founder (March 2025)
Description:
This ad is not for an employment, but an opportunity to build a VC-backed startup from the ground up. You must commit to relocate to either Amsterdam, Berlin or Munich for 10 weeks.




Note: The Paris office is part of Antler Continental Europe. For the September Residency, you will need to relocate to Amsterdam, Berlin, or Munich for the entire 10-week duration. After forming your co-founding team, you will receive support from the Antler Paris Office and can then relocate to France.




Who you are:

Are you a ML or AI engineer with experience in APIs model integration, ML powered models optimization, or AI powered robotics? Do you have strong problem-solving abilities, a leadership track record, and a passion for developing tech solutions using cutting-edge technologies? Have you spent your career building game-changing software/hardware for early-stage startups, scale-ups or big corporations? Most importantly, are you looking to build a disruptive tech venture in the vibrant ecosystem of Paris? If so, we would like to hear from you!




About Antler

Antler is the world's most active venture capital firm, providing funding from pre-seed to Series C. We invest in Founders who seek to define our tomorrow and reshape the world we live in with groundbreaking technological innovation. Every year, we handpick the strongest Founders across our 30 locations on the globe, which has led us to work with more than 8,000 founders to date and a portfolio of more than 1,200 startups.




The Antler Founder Residency

Our 10-week, full-time program is designed to give you the best possible start for your entrepreneurial journey. Whether you have founded a company before or are just getting started, we will help you find a co-founding team among the 50-70 people that will be joining the program. Founders that join our programs come from a variety of backgrounds and have an assortment of skills and expertise. Our program will facilitate you and your co-founder to quickly build on an idea (either you come with an idea or you will be defining it with your team). If you enjoy a fast-paced, diverse, demanding, and incredibly engaging environment, join us!

10-Week full-time Immersive Journey: Kicking off March, 2025, in Amsterdam, Berlin or Munich
Co-Founder Discovery: In the first 10 weeks, collaborate with fellow Founders to find your co-founder(s).
Pitch to Invest: Present your team and business idea to the Antler Investment Committee: €300k investment commitment at Day Zero in two tranches of €100k for 10% without dilution protection and €200k converting at the valuation of your next round.
Accelerate Growth: If funded, we work closely with you to make your startup a success!




About you:

For our upcoming residency program, we are scouting technical profiles across different areas in the IT industry who want to build the next disruptive tech venture from scratch! Technical profiles joining our program play an instrumental role as Co-founders, mainly being responsible for the tech/product side of the business, which requires that you:

identify as someone with deep expertise in data engineering, machine learning, artificial intelligence
have strong analytical skills with hands-on experience in conducting technological analyses and applying advanced analytics & Machine Learning methodologies
execute on data collection plans from both structured and unstructured sources that help in data exploration, hypothesis testing and statistical modelling
design, develop, and implement models, proofs-of-concept and pre-product prototypes




Application Process

Our streamlined application process takes only 2-3 weeks:

Apply through our website.
Participate in an introductory interview.
Progress to an in-depth interview with our partners.
Receive a potential offer.




Meet Our Success Stories:

Treyd: A buy-now-pay-later solution for supplier invoices.
Two: A comprehensive B2B payment suite simplifying sales for online and offline businesses.
Evyon: A developer of eco-friendly battery energy storage systems.
Glint Solar: Software accelerating identification of optimal solar installation sites.
PerPlant: AI-powered sensor systems creating a gateway to sustainable agriculture

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
Job Title: Data Scientist

Location: Remote ( EU )

Job Type: Contract ( 6 Months )

Job Description:

We are seeking a skilled and detail-oriented Data Scientist with a strong background in data science research and hands-on experience with machine learning models. The ideal candidate will have a robust statistical foundation, exposure to CI/CD pipelines, and experience working with GitLab for version control. Knowledge of chemistry or related scientific fields is considered a plus.

Key Responsibilities:


Conduct research and develop data-driven solutions using statistical analysis and machine learning models.
Design, implement, and optimise machine learning models for predictive and prescriptive analytics.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate machine learning models into production environments using CI/CD practices.
Manage and version control code and data models using GitLab.
Analyse large datasets and derive actionable insights to support data-driven decision-making.
Work with stakeholders to understand requirements, create data solutions, and communicate results effectively.
Leverage knowledge of chemistry (preferred) in problem-solving and application of data science models to scientific data.



Qualifications:


Experience: 2+ years of data science research experience.
Machine Learning: Proven experience in building and deploying machine learning models.
Statistical Background: Strong foundation in statistical methods, probability, and data analysis techniques.
CI/CD Pipelines: Experience with continuous integration and deployment processes.
GitLab: Familiarity with version control and collaborative workflows in GitLab.
Chemistry Knowledge: A plus, especially for projects involving scientific or chemical data.



Skills:


Proficiency in Python, R, or other programming languages used in data science.
Experience with libraries such as TensorFlow, or similar.
Strong analytical skills with the ability to translate business needs into technical solutions.
Excellent communication skills to convey complex data insights to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.



Preferred Qualifications:


Advanced degree (Master’s or Ph.D.) in Data Science, Statistics, Computer Science, Chemistry, or a related field.

Title: Senior Data Scientist, Support (GenAI)
Description:
Job Description

We're looking for an awesome someone to join our Support Group, the development organization that builds our in-house customer service tooling. They work on topics like support chat, operational tooling for support agents, and self-service and automation. We see great opportunities for applying machine learning and AI in this domain, and are now strengthening the data science team there.

We're looking for someone to work embedded in a cross-functional development team where the data scientists work together with engineers, designers, and product and analytics people owning that area and domain end to end. You would be contributing to projects that have visible business impact, owning the data science parts of the solution, and working through the whole lifecycle of the development process - from ideation to deployment and maintenance.

Potential work topics can range from developing co-pilot tools for our support associates and AI assistants for our customers with the latest AI technologies, to working on more traditional machine learning and optimization problems.

📍This role can be based in one of our tech hubs in Helsinki, Berlin or Stockholm, or you can work remotely anywhere in Finland, Sweden, or Germany.

Our humble expectations

What we hope from you is that you first and foremost identify yourself as a Data Science enthusiast. Solving problems and making a business impact via Data Science is what makes you jump for joy!


You have previous experience building Data Science, Machine Learning and AI solutions with a measurable impact. You understand how to build data products, and deeply care about the end user experience;
You also understand what it takes to build production-level ML and AI solutions. You have experience with real-time applications and large scale deployments, and can handle the entire life cycle of data science solutions from ideation to maintenance;
Deep understanding and experience with Machine Learning and AI, a solid understanding of Statistics, and experience and knowledge in NLP. Experience in working as a part of an engineering team, building solutions to complex problems with large scale and real-time requirements.
Interest towards LLMs and GenAI and their applications to solving problems in production.


Next Steps

The position will be filled as soon as we find the right person, so make sure to apply as soon as you realize you really, really want to join us!

The compensation will be a negotiable combination of monthly pay and DoorDash RSUs. The latter makes it exceptionally easy to be excited about our company growing and doing well, as you’ll own a piece of the pie.

For any further questions about the position, you can turn to Product+ Talent Acquisition Partner - Fernanda Prado (fernanda.prado.e.silva@wolt.com).

About Wolt

Wolt is a Helsinki-based technology company that provides an online platform for consumers, merchants and couriers. It connects people looking to order food and other goods with people interested in selling and delivering them. To enable this, Wolt develops a wide range of technologies from local logistics to retail software and financial solutions – as well as operating its own grocery stores under the Wolt Market brand. Wolt’s products include Wolt+ (subscription service for customers), Wolt for Work (meal benefits and office deliveries for companies), Wolt Drive (fast last-mile deliveries for merchants) and Wolt Self-Delivery (service for merchant partners with their own delivery staff). Wolt’s mission is to make cities better by empowering and growing local communities. Wolt was founded in 2014 and joined forces with DoorDash in 2022. DoorDash operates in 29 countries today, 25 of which are with the Wolt product and brand.

Working in Product Development at Wolt

At Wolt, we’re about getting things done. You’ll probably enjoy it here if you like taking ownership, developing yourself and being around friendly, humble and ambitious people.

The behind the scenes of Wolt is run by an awesome bunch of over 700+ planners, builders, designers and data crunchers. We call ourselves Product+, as we’re the very core of Wolt’s products, tools and platforms. To build our products, we work in over 60 cross-functional, independent and autonomous teams. Teams are made up of a mix of talented individuals: engineers, designers, data scientists, analysts, and product leads. Each team takes ownership for solving customer problems in the best possible way.

Our Commitment to Diversity, Equity & Inclusion

We want to have all sorts of people in our team – people like you and me, and people different from you and me. To be able to work with diverse teammates – when it comes to gender, age, ethnicity, life background, sexual orientation, political views, religion, or any other personal trait – we consciously aim to offer equal opportunity for everyone to work with us. This is because we believe diverse teams make the most thought-through decisions and build things in the most inclusive way.

Join us today to build Wolt together.

Title: Senior Machine Learning Engineer, Search
HTML:
Job Description

The Search Relevance team, within Wolt’s Search department, owns the ML components of the Search’s stack that retrieve and rank restaurants, stores, dishes and items. Thanks to the team’s ML capabilities, Wolt can find the right results for a customer query in different touchpoints of our customers’ journey.

As a Senior Machine Learning Engineer in Wolt’s Search Relevance team you will:

  • Develop, train, deploy and maintain retrieval and ranking models that will surface the right content for our customers’ queries;
  • Work at Wolt’s scale: Wolt operates in 28 different markets with as many languages and millions of customers;
  • Be part of a cross-disciplinary team with Applied Scientists, Software Engineers and Analysts to provide solutions to customer problems with a direct impact on the company’s business KPIs;
  • Build the team’s ML infrastructure and raise the team’s ML engineering excellence bar;
  • Monitor, maintain and troubleshoot the Search Relevance’s ML stack;
  • Contribute to our MLOps practices and liaise with Wolt’s ML Platform team.

📍This role can be based in one of our tech hubs in Berlin, Helsinki, or Stockholm.

Our humble expectations

  • You are experienced in end-to-end machine learning deployments and maintenance of ML systems and have at least 4+ years of experience in ML/MLOps;
  • You have deployed and ran ML models in production at scale;
  • You bring solid experience in scaling and troubleshooting machine learning deployments to the table. You can help with the technical issues the teams encounter;
  • You are experienced in supporting real-time inference ML models in production;
  • Good understanding of ML and MLOps principles as well as Software engineering experience in Python should complete your profile;
  • Experienced in Docker, Kubernetes, workflow orchestration tools (e.g. Flyte), model and experiment registries (e.g. MLflow) and model serving systems (e.g. Seldon);
  • Domain experience in Search is highly preferable. We value previous experience building, managing and improving highly performant search solutions;
  • You have solid communication and collaboration skills and are experienced in coordinating initiatives with your team and main technical and non-technical stakeholders.

Next Steps

The position will be filled as soon as we find the right person, so make sure to apply as soon as you realize you really, really want to join us!

The compensation will be a negotiable combination of monthly pay and DoorDash RSUs. The latter makes it exceptionally easy to be excited about our company growing and doing well, as you’ll own a piece of the pie.

For any further questions about the position, you can turn to Product+ Talent Acquisition Partner - Fernanda (fernanda.prado.e.silva@wolt.com).

Title: Senior Data Scientist (d/f/m)
Description:
Why us?

We believe that AI has the potential to revolutionize how cancer and other complex diseases are diagnosed and treated. We also believe that AI is a tool, not an identity – without access to high quality data and a scientifically rigorous, transparent approach to model development, AI is just a buzzword. That’s where we come in.

Aignostics is a spin-off from one of Europe's largest and most prestigious university hospitals (Charité), with employees in Berlin and New York. We have received over $20M in funding from leading investors and are a growing team of over 100 interdisciplinary professionals. We work with academic partners as well as leading global life sciences companies.

As a Senior Data Scientist at Aignostics, you work hand in hand with our collaborators in academia and industry to push the state of the art of machine learning for digital pathology. You translate biomedical challenges into concrete machine learning research roadmaps and coordinate their execution. Together with your colleagues you develop elegant solutions to complex problems, conduct rigorous experiments and finally convince your stakeholders with crystal clear presentations.

At Aignostics, we believe that fighting cancer is a job for people of all identities, backgrounds, and cultures. We value and celebrate diversity and inclusion and are committed to offering equal employment and promotion opportunities for all applicants and employees. Applicants will be considered regardless of their age, disability, ethnicity, race, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, religion, etc. We thrive through collaboration and believe the more inclusive we are, the better our work will be.

Where your expertise is needed


Plan and execute interdisciplinary projects connecting machine learning, software engineering and biomedical domain knowledge
Research, pilot and evaluate novel computer vision approaches for extracting insight from high-resolution biological images
Transform proof-of-concept machine learning models into automated, tested and production-ready systems
Support and mentor junior colleagues
Clearly communicate your results in internal and external presentations


What We Are Looking For


Ph.D or MSc. in a relevant field, e.g. Computer Science, Machine Learning or Bioinformatics
Eagerness to lead initiatives, learn new technologies and excel in a complex space
Solid theoretical foundations and several years of experience developing novel machine learning techniques
Advanced skills in Python, Linux, cloud computing and machine learning software stacks
Passion for clean code and high standards for quality assurance
Ability to independently define, organize and complete research projects
Excellent communication and team working skills Bonus points for
Experience with development of deep learning models for computer vision
Exposure to biomedical data
Leadership experience in a research context


We are still keen to hear from you if you don't match all the above points! Our needs are diverse and growing and you are encouraged to apply if you have any combination of these skills. The recruitment process is a comparative exercise and decisions will be made based on the applications we review at each time.

Our offer


Join a purpose-driven start up: We are working collectively to fight cancer and improve patient outcomes. Come help us make a difference!
Cutting-edge AI research and development, with involvement of Charité, TU Berlin and our other partners
Work with a welcoming, diverse and highly international team of colleagues
Opportunity to take responsibility and grow your role within the startup
Expand your skills by benefitting from our Learning & Development budget, language classes and internal development programs
Mentoring program, you’ll learn from great experts
Flexible working hours and teleworking policy
Enjoy your well-deserved time off within our 28 paid vacations days per year
We are family & pet friendly and support flexible parental leave options
Pick a subsidized membership of your choice among public transport sports and well-being
Enjoy our social gatherings, lunches, and off-site events for a fun and inclusive work environment


Join us to make a difference!

About Us

aignostics.com
Show more
HTML:
Why us?

We believe that AI has the potential to revolutionize how cancer and other complex diseases are diagnosed and treated. We also believe that AI is a tool, not an identity – without access to high quality data and a scientifically rigorous, transparent approach to model development, AI is just a buzzword. That’s where we come in.

Aignostics is a spin-off from one of Europe's largest and most prestigious university hospitals (Charité), with employees in Berlin and New York. We have received over $20M in funding from leading investors and are a growing team of over 100 interdisciplinary professionals. We work with academic partners as well as leading global life sciences companies.

As a Senior Data Scientist at Aignostics, you work hand in hand with our collaborators in academia and industry to push the state of the art of machine learning for digital pathology. You translate biomedical challenges into concrete machine learning research roadmaps and coordinate their execution. Together with your colleagues you develop elegant solutions to complex problems, conduct rigorous experiments and finally convince your stakeholders with crystal clear presentations.

At Aignostics, we believe that fighting cancer is a job for people of all identities, backgrounds, and cultures. We value and celebrate diversity and inclusion and are committed to offering equal employment and promotion opportunities for all applicants and employees. Applicants will be considered regardless of their age, disability, ethnicity, race, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, religion, etc. We thrive through collaboration and believe the more inclusive we are, the better our work will be.

Where your expertise is needed

  • Plan and execute interdisciplinary projects connecting machine learning, software engineering and biomedical domain knowledge
  • Research, pilot and evaluate novel computer vision approaches for extracting insight from high-resolution biological images
  • Transform proof-of-concept machine learning models into automated, tested and production-ready systems
  • Support and mentor junior colleagues
  • Clearly communicate your results in internal and external presentations

What We Are Looking For

  • Ph.D or MSc. in a relevant field, e.g. Computer Science, Machine Learning or Bioinformatics
  • Eagerness to lead initiatives, learn new technologies and excel in a complex space
  • Solid theoretical foundations and several years of experience developing novel machine learning techniques
  • Advanced skills in Python, Linux, cloud computing and machine learning software stacks
  • Passion for clean code and high standards for quality assurance
  • Ability to independently define, organize and complete research projects
  • Excellent communication and team working skills Bonus points for
  • Experience with development of deep learning models for computer vision
  • Exposure to biomedical data
  • Leadership experience in a research context

We are still keen to hear from you if you don't match all the above points! Our needs are diverse and growing and you are encouraged to apply if you have any combination of these skills. The recruitment process is a comparative exercise and decisions will be made based on the applications we review at each time.

Our offer

  • Join a purpose-driven start up: We are working collectively to fight cancer and improve patient outcomes. Come help us make a difference!
  • Cutting-edge AI research and development, with involvement of Charité, TU Berlin and our other partners
  • Work with a welcoming, diverse and highly international team of colleagues
  • Opportunity to take responsibility and grow your role within the startup
  • Expand your skills by benefitting from our Learning & Development budget, language classes and internal development programs
  • Mentoring program, you’ll learn from great experts
  • Flexible working hours and teleworking policy
  • Enjoy your well-deserved time off within our 28 paid vacations days per year
  • We are family & pet friendly and support flexible parental leave options
  • Pick a subsidized membership of your choice among public transport sports and well-being
  • Enjoy our social gatherings, lunches, and off-site events for a fun and inclusive work environment

Join us to make a difference!

Title: Senior Data Scientist
Description:
About Fit Analytics Innovation GmbH




Fit Analytics Innovation is a leading technology company specializing in innovative and sustainable solutions for the retail industry. Our mission is to revolutionize the online shopping experience by providing personalized recommendations including size and fit, style, and alternative product suggestions. Our technologies support shoppers and retailers alike by reducing returns, increasing conversions, enhancing customer satisfaction, and ultimately helping the environment.




As a trusted partner of leading global apparel and footwear retailers, Fit Analytics is dedicated to optimizing the online shopping journey. By seamlessly integrating our sizing technology, we empower customers to make informed choices, leading to a more efficient and enjoyable shopping experience.




Our cutting-edge AI solution - Fit Finder - delivers precise size recommendations tailored to individual customers. Our machine learning technology takes brand-specific sizing variations and individual body measurements into account, ensuring a personalized and reliable fit for each shopper.




Our team members come from all around the world, creating a global collective of passionate domain experts dedicated to solving sizing for our partners and their shoppers.




Role Overview:

Embark on an exciting journey with Fit Analytics Innovation as a Senior Data Scientist, where you'll play a pivotal role in driving the success of our cutting-edge recommendation solutions. As a seasoned professional, you will contribute to projects in production with your strong ML and SWE skillset. Additionally, you will have the opportunity to pave the way forward with innovative ideas and bring them to life.




Key Responsibilities:

Develop state of the art solutions for apparel sizing, style, and product recommendations.
Experience with implementing the lifecycle of ML solutions
Champion best practices in code quality, review, and software architecture.
Drive continuous innovation in ML techniques and strategies to maintain competitive advantage and keep pace with industry standards.
Collaborate with product and engineering teams to align ML technologies with business goals and enhance customer outcomes.




Requirements and Qualifications:

Proven experience as a Senior Data Scientist, particularly in recommendation systems and scalable ML solutions.
Proficient in Python and SQL.
Extensive experience with ML frameworks and tools such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, and ML serving technologies like TensorFlow Serving or NVIDIA Triton.
Proficient in developing and optimizing ML pipelines, model deployment, and serving strategies.
Strong record of software engineering best practices, including testing, data structures, algorithms, and complexity analysis.
Proactive attitude towards organizational growth, personal development and developing team spirit
Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to communicate complex ideas effectively with all levels of an organization.

Show more

Title: Sports Scientist (m/f/x)
Description:
We are currently seeking a highly motivated and passionate individual who is committed to enhancing performance and wellbeing of our clients though data driven guidance. HAGIUS is pleased to offer an exceptional opportunity for a Sport Scientist (m/f/x) to join our dedicated team. With our small team, we provide a unique environment where every contribution is valued, yet our scale is sufficient to have a meaningful impact within the Wellness and Fitness industry.

The ideal candidate will possess a strong desire to assist our clients in achieving their fitness and wellness objectives. If you excel in a dynamic, supportive atmosphere and are keen on collaborating with a team equally committed to health and wellbeing, we invite you to apply.

Tasks


Working in and as part of a team of experts
Conducting personal training sessions and classes
Creating and performing physical assessments (using tools like force plates)
Assessing mental and emotional wellbeing
Analyzing assessment data and setting goals with clients
Creating training plans, schedules, recommendations based on data
Guiding clients through their journey at Hagius
Observing the progress made by clients
Gathering feedback from clients and trainers.
Fine-tune plans depending on progress and assessment data
Ensuring flow of information to the necessary team members


Requirements


Interest in the tasks above
Passion for data-driven fitness guidance
Ability to work as a team player in a team of experts
High-quality education in sports science (University Degree or comparable education)
at least one year work experience in the field of data driven training


Benefits


being part of a passionate team that's striving for honest training with high quality
free participation in classes and usage of facilities


We are looking forward to your application.
Show more

Title: ML / AI Engineer & Startup Founder (March 2025)
Description:
This ad is not for an employment, but an opportunity to build a VC-backed startup from the ground up. You must commit to relocate to either Amsterdam, Berlin or Munich for 10 weeks.




Note: The Paris office is part of Antler Continental Europe. For the September Residency, you will need to relocate to Amsterdam, Berlin, or Munich for the entire 10-week duration. After forming your co-founding team, you will receive support from the Antler Paris Office and can then relocate to France.




Who you are:

Are you a ML or AI engineer with experience in APIs model integration, ML powered models optimization, or AI powered robotics? Do you have strong problem-solving abilities, a leadership track record, and a passion for developing tech solutions using cutting-edge technologies? Have you spent your career building game-changing software/hardware for early-stage startups, scale-ups or big corporations? Most importantly, are you looking to build a disruptive tech venture in the vibrant ecosystem of Paris? If so, we would like to hear from you!




About Antler

Antler is the world's most active venture capital firm, providing funding from pre-seed to Series C. We invest in Founders who seek to define our tomorrow and reshape the world we live in with groundbreaking technological innovation. Every year, we handpick the strongest Founders across our 30 locations on the globe, which has led us to work with more than 8,000 founders to date and a portfolio of more than 1,200 startups.




The Antler Founder Residency

Our 10-week, full-time program is designed to give you the best possible start for your entrepreneurial journey. Whether you have founded a company before or are just getting started, we will help you find a co-founding team among the 50-70 people that will be joining the program. Founders that join our programs come from a variety of backgrounds and have an assortment of skills and expertise. Our program will facilitate you and your co-founder to quickly build on an idea (either you come with an idea or you will be defining it with your team). If you enjoy a fast-paced, diverse, demanding, and incredibly engaging environment, join us!

10-Week full-time Immersive Journey: Kicking off March, 2025, in Amsterdam, Berlin or Munich
Co-Founder Discovery: In the first 10 weeks, collaborate with fellow Founders to find your co-founder(s).
Pitch to Invest: Present your team and business idea to the Antler Investment Committee: €300k investment commitment at Day Zero in two tranches of €100k for 10% without dilution protection and €200k converting at the valuation of your next round.
Accelerate Growth: If funded, we work closely with you to make your startup a success!




About you:

For our upcoming residency program, we are scouting technical profiles across different areas in the IT industry who want to build the next disruptive tech venture from scratch! Technical profiles joining our program play an instrumental role as Co-founders, mainly being responsible for the tech/product side of the business, which requires that you:

identify as someone with deep expertise in data engineering, machine learning, artificial intelligence
have strong analytical skills with hands-on experience in conducting technological analyses and applying advanced analytics & Machine Learning methodologies
execute on data collection plans from both structured and unstructured sources that help in data exploration, hypothesis testing and statistical modelling
design, develop, and implement models, proofs-of-concept and pre-product prototypes




Application Process

Our streamlined application process takes only 2-3 weeks:

Apply through our website.
Participate in an introductory interview.
Progress to an in-depth interview with our partners.
Receive a potential offer.




Meet Our Success Stories:

Treyd: A buy-now-pay-later solution for supplier invoices.
Two: A comprehensive B2B payment suite simplifying sales for online and offline businesses.
Evyon: A developer of eco-friendly battery energy storage systems.
Glint Solar: Software accelerating identification of optimal solar installation sites.
PerPlant: AI-powered sensor systems creating a gateway to sustainable agriculture

Title: Senior People Data Scientist (All genders) - Global People Analytics team
Description:
About The Opportunity

We are looking for a Senior People Data Scientist (All genders) to join the Global People Analytics team on our journey to always aim higher and deliver better automated solutions.

Your mission:


Own the entire analysis cycle, from gathering the business requirements, framing the business question, building hypotheses, to running the analysis, revealing and presenting insights and recommending meaningful actions to senior Heroes
Translate everyday business problems into hypothesis / research questions which can be measured
Lead specific analytical projects as required in support of the overall People Analytics and P&C team goals and objectives
Steer and influence the team’s direction and design KPIs and OKRs
Co-own the People data domain and be the point of contact for this part of DH's data
Work closely with your manager and the global people analytics community at DH to maintain a healthy pipeline of People Analytics initiatives
Select appropriate methodologies / techniques to analyze data and extract insight for key stakeholders in an efficient and secure way
Collaborate with analysts and data scientist in other teams to learn new methodologies and share best practices
Play a critical role to upskill the analytics capabilities of the P&C at scale and ensure that all Heroes are able to avoid common stats pitfalls and can correctly interpret People data from our self-serve dashboards and people data platforms
Ensure compliance with data privacy regulations and best practices


What you need to be successful


Bachelor's or Master’s degree (strongly preferred) in Economics, Statistics, Data Science or other technical fields
Background working in similar data-driven roles and 5+ years of experience in People analytics
Proven, direct experience in the use of data and analytical tools (such as Python, R) to develop models and algorithms
Able to identify the most appropriate statistical technique, supervised and / or unsupervised machine learning algorithm to answer a given business question
Advanced understanding of statistics and basic principles of data analysis
Great storyteller and can clearly present insights to both technical and non-technical audiences
Have worked in cross functional teams and can manage senior stakeholders
Self-starter who is comfortable working autonomously


Who we are

As the world’s pioneering local delivery platform, our mission is to deliver an amazing experience, fast, easy, and to your door. We operate in over 70+ countries worldwide, powered by tech, designed by people. As one of Europe’s largest tech platforms, we enable creative minds to deliver solutions that create impact within our ecosystem. We move fast, take action and adapt. No matter where you're from or what you believe in, we build, we deliver, we lead. We are Delivery Hero

What's in it for you

Ensuring you and all our Heroes are looked after, happy, and healthy is always on the menu. Because if you’re in good shape, then we’re in good shape.


Make the most of our hybrid working model and join the team for face-to-face connection and collaboration in our beautiful Berlin campus 2 days a week
We offer 27 days holiday with an extra day on 2nd and 3rd year of service
Ensuring you and all our Heroes are looked after, happy, and healthy is always on the menu. Because if you’re in good shape, then we’re in good shape
Get moving and release those wonderful, mind-boosting endorphins: Health Checkups, Meditation, Yoga, Gym & Bicycle Subsidy
Cash. Dough. Cheddar. Whatever you call it, we’ll help you with it: Employee Share Purchase Plan, Sabbatical Bank, Public Transportation Ticket Discount, Life & Accident Insurance, Corporate Pension Plan
Look up and go for it. We will support you in developing yourself and your career: 1.000 € Educational Budget, Language Courses, Parental Support
The power of getting together over some food is unrivaled. Here are a few ways to help you do that. All the yum: Digital Meal Vouchers, Food Vouchers, Corporate Discounts


At Delivery Hero, we believe diversity and inclusion are key to creating not only an exciting product, but also an amazing customer and employee experience. Fostering this starts with hiring -- therefore we do not discriminate on the basis of racial identities, religious beliefs, color, national origin, gender identities or expressions, sexual orientations, age, marital or disability statuses, or any other aspect that makes you, you. Just be yourself and we can’t wait to see what value you bring to the role. We're as interested in your character as we are in your talent.

Title: Staff Data Scientist - Ad Tech (all genders)
Description:
About The Opportunity

Be our next Hero! - Join the world’s leading local delivery platform.

We are looking for Staff Data Scientists (all genders) to join the Ad Tech data science team in our mission to deliver consistently amazing experiences.

You will be a thought leader, driving innovation by designing and deploying our models to the forefront of technology to solve complex problems, delivering revenue for Delivery Hero at the frontline of our growth & profitability journey.

At Delivery Hero, AdTech introduces people to new food they love and enables our partners to meet their future customers at the perfect moment. We have developed a range of products to offer advertising solutions for restaurants helping them to increase their visibility and reach, improve their order conversion, and eventually drive more sales by covering the entire marketing funnel. Operating across over 50 countries around the clock, our Ad Tech connects the ideal advertiser with the ideal customer millions of times every day. In 2024/25, Ad Tech is a fundamental area for us on our path to profitability and is predicted to generate more than 1 billion euros in revenue for Delivery Hero; our data science team is at the heart of this growth, powering personalisation, relevance, and recommendation.

The Ad Tech data science team operates within the wider Vendor Data tribe whose mission is to drive innovation, insight-driven decision making and to solve business problems through a culture of excellence and openness. The tribe comprises teams of skilled analysts, engineers, and scientists working together to deliver data solutions covering a host of business opportunities across all of Delivery Hero’s 70+ markets.

If you're a creative problem solver who is hungry for a new adventure, an international workplace is waiting for you in the heart of Berlin!

Your mission:


Spearhead a revolution of Ad Tech at Delivery Hero through the innovative application of cutting edge tools and techniques such as neural networks and reinforcement learning covering areas such as ad ranking, bidding strategies, and ad pacing driving unparalleled improvements in advertising campaigns.
Analyse large-scale datasets to understand and identify opportunities deploying sophisticated statistical techniques to improve ad relevance, click-through rates, and conversion metrics.
Lead research initiatives to explore emerging trends and technologies in AdTech and machine learning, contributing to the advancement of Delivery Hero's advertising products and algorithms. Remain at the forefront of industry and research developments incorporating new methodologies and best practices into our data science workflows and models.
Serve as a subject matter expert in data science and machine learning, providing guidance and mentorship to other team members and fostering a culture of continuous learning and innovation within the data science team.


What you need to be successful


You are an industry-leading talent at modelling business problems using machine learning techniques covering feature engineering, model selection and design as well as evaluation and optimisation to deliver enormous value to the business.
You raise the performance of other team members through effective and mature mentorship and constructive collaboration to benefit others from your deep understanding and experience of data science.
You have extensive expertise in building and training complex neural network models with strong knowledge of the Python data toolkit centering around deep learning i.e. Keras and ideally Tensorflow and TFX
Through the seamless use of SQL queries you are able to explore our data universe and gather data to support your analysis and the development of machine learning solutions.
You write clean, production-level code and are able to effectively set up your environment to minimise testing loops influencing the entire team to work more efficiently and reliably.
You are familiar with deploying and developing complex neural networks to serve live traffic and experience collaborating with ML engineers in cloud systems, ideally GCP.
You love to learn, are a critical thinker and creative problem solver who strives for excellence.
You are a team player who loves to collaborate and work with stakeholders from a variety of teams in a diverse environment.


Nice to have:


Implementing neural networks to specifically solve Ad Tech challenges would be highly desirable.


Who we are

As the world’s pioneering local delivery platform, our mission is to deliver an amazing experience, fast, easy, and to your door. We operate in over 70+ countries worldwide, powered by tech, designed by people. As one of Europe’s largest tech platforms, we enable creative minds to deliver solutions that create impact within our ecosystem. We move fast, take action and adapt. No matter where you're from or what you believe in, we build, we deliver, we lead. We are Delivery Hero

What's in it for you

Ensuring you and all our Heroes are looked after, happy, and healthy is always on the menu. Because if you’re in good shape, then we’re in good shape.


Make the most of our hybrid working model and join the team for face-to-face connection and collaboration in our beautiful Berlin campus 2 days a week
We offer 27 days holiday with an extra day on 2nd and 3rd year of service
Get moving and release those wonderful, mind-boosting endorphins: Health Checkups, Meditation, Yoga, Gym & Bicycle Subsidy
Cash. Dough. Cheddar. Whatever you call it, we’ll help you with it: Employee Share Purchase Plan, Sabbatical Bank, Public Transportation Ticket Discount, Life & Accident Insurance, Corporate Pension Plan
Look up and go for it. We will support you in developing yourself and your career: 1.000 € Educational Budget, Language Courses, Parental Support
The power of getting together over some food is unrivaled. Here are a few ways to help you do that. All the yum: Digital Meal Vouchers, Food Vouchers, Corporate Discounts


At Delivery Hero, we believe diversity and inclusion are key to creating not only an exciting product, but also an amazing customer and employee experience. Fostering this starts with hiring -- therefore we do not discriminate on the basis of racial identities, religious beliefs, color, national origin, gender identities or expressions, sexual orientations, age, marital or disability statuses, or any other aspect that makes you, you. Just be yourself and we can’t wait to see what value you bring to the role. We're as interested in your character as we are in your talent.

At Delivery Hero, we believe diversity and inclusion are key to creating not only an exciting product, but also an amazing customer and employee experience. Fostering this starts with hiring -- therefore we do not discriminate on the basis of racial identities, religious beliefs, color, national origin, gender identities or expressions, sexual orientations, age, marital or disability statuses, or any other aspect that makes you, you. Just be yourself and we can’t wait to see what value you bring to the role. We're as interested in your character as we are in your talent.

Title: Head of Data Science (f/m/x)
Description:
Company Description

We are seeking a technically skilled Head of Data Science to join our dynamic Data Science department at AUTO1 Group Technology. As part of our disruptive approach in the used car market, our team leverages advanced machine learning techniques to drive innovation and enhance our platforms and processes. AUTO1 Group is Europe's leading digital automotive platform. We revolutionize the used car market with our well-known brands Autohero, wirkaufendeinauto.de, and AUTO1.com.

Job Description


Drive the development and deployment of impactful machine learning models that deliver business results.
Work closely with Data Science Team Leads to oversee the development of various machine learning topics, ensuring resources are allocated effectively and projects stay on track.
Provide technical expertise and guidance to team members, offering advice on modeling questions and making critical MLOps design choices.
Motivate and inspire team members to reach their maximum potential, attracting and retaining top talent.
Collaborate with stakeholders and partners in the tech department to identify and capitalize on business opportunities.
Advocate best practices in processes, coding standards, and technologies within the data science department.


Qualifications


Proven experience in managing teams or departments, with a focus on technical guidance and mentorship.
Demonstrated track record of generating substantial business impact through successful development and deployment of machine learning models.
Profound knowledge of predictive machine learning models, software engineering practices, and machine learning operations.
Experience or quick adaptability to our tech stack, including Python, AWS services (Step Functions, Glue, Sagemaker & Sagemaker Python SDK, Redshift, etc.), Jenkins, Terraform, FastAPI and SQL.
Strong business understanding and the ability to draw meaningful conclusions from A/B test experiments, providing relevant insights to stakeholders.


Additional Information

Our offer


Colleagues who strive for excellence and utilize the latest technologies. See what we do in our Tech-Blog: https://auto1.tech.
Our dynamic environment offers new challenges for personal growth and encourages the contribution of your own ideas.
More than 100 different nationalities contribute to a truly international and diverse working environment.
30 days of vacation per year.
Educational budget to support your continuous learning and development.
Discounts at Autohero, our platform for high-quality used cars.


Apply by uploading your CV with a note of your earliest starting date.

Contact

Lina Antoniuk

At AUTO1 Group we live an open culture, believe in direct communication, and value diversity. We welcome every applicant; regardless of gender, ethnic origin, religion, age, sexual identity, disability, or any other non-merit factor.

Title: Machine Learning Engineer, International Public Sector
Description:
Scale is growing rapidly, and joining the Global International Public Sector team is an opportunity to work on one of the most rapidly expanding teams at Scale. This team is responsible for generating, executing, and fostering Scale’s work outside of the United States. There are three core types of work involved:


Building custom LLMs
Providing high-quality training data for research institutions building LLMs from scratch
Partnerships, upskilling, and advisory


As the first MLE hire on the team you will focus be on developing Models as a Service for our partners by optimizing LLMs through finetuning, RAG or other techniques. You will be involved end-to-end from coordinating with operations to create high quality datasets to productionizing models for our customers. If you are excited about shaping the future of the data-centric AI movement, we would love to hear from you!

You will:


Study and implement cutting edge research in the field
Design and implement agent workflows that leverage pre-training and fine tuning techniques to customize LLMs and embedding models for downstream tasks
Understand customer needs
Work with large unstructured data
Build evaluation systems
Work cross functionally with our data annotation teams and fine tune models on this data
Travel up to 2 weeks per quarter to meet with the customer


Minimum Qualifications:


At least 2+ years of model training, deployment and maintenance experience in a production environment
Trained deep learning models + have built up that skillset
Strong skills in NLP, LLMs and deep learning
Ability and interest in traveling to the client site in the Middle East region at least one week each quarter

Ideal Qualifications:


Proficient in reading and writing in Arabic
Past experience working at a startup or in a forward-deployed role
Has experience working cross functionally with operations
Experience in dealing with large scale AI problems, ideally in the generative-AI field
Demonstrated expertise in large vision-language models for diverse real-world applications, e.g. classification, detection, question-answering, etc.
Published research in areas of machine learning at major conferences (NeurIPS, ICML, EMNLP, CVPR, etc.) and/or journals
Strong high-level programming skills (e.g., Python), frameworks and tools such as DeepSpeed, Pytorch lightning, Kuberflow, TensorFlow, etc.
Strong written and verbal communication skills to operate in a cross functional team environment


PLEASE NOTE: Our policy requires a 90-day waiting period before reconsidering candidates for the same role. This allows us to ensure a fair and thorough evaluation of all applicants.

About Us:

At Scale, we believe that the transition from traditional software to AI is one of the most important shifts of our time. Our mission is to make that happen faster across every industry, and our team is transforming how organizations build and deploy AI. Our products power the world's most advanced LLMs, generative models, and computer vision models. We are trusted by generative AI companies such as OpenAI, Meta, and Microsoft, government agencies like the U.S. Army and U.S. Air Force, and enterprises including GM and Accenture. We are expanding our team to accelerate the development of AI applications.

We believe that everyone should be able to bring their whole selves to work, which is why we are proud to be an affirmative action employer and inclusive and equal opportunity workplace. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability status, gender identity or Veteran status.

We are committed to working with and providing reasonable accommodations to applicants with physical and mental disabilities. If you need assistance and/or a reasonable accommodation in the application or recruiting process due to a disability, please contact us at accommodations@scale.com. Please see the United States Department of Labor's Know Your Rights poster for additional information.

We comply with the United States Department of Labor's Pay Transparency provision.

PLEASE NOTE: We collect, retain and use personal data for our professional business purposes, including notifying you of job opportunities that may be of interest and sharing with our affiliates. We limit the personal data we collect to that which we believe is appropriate and necessary to manage applicants’ needs, provide our services, and comply with applicable laws. Any information we collect in connection with your application will be treated in accordance with our internal policies and programs designed to protect personal data. Please see our privacy policy for additional information.

Title: Junior AI-Engineer (m/w/d)
Description:
Unternehmensbeschreibung

Die Deutsche Presse-Agentur (dpa) wurde 1949 gegründet und gehört zu den weltweit führenden unabhängigen Nachrichtenagenturen. dpa beliefert Medien, Unternehmen und Organisationen mit redaktionellen Angeboten. Dazu zählen Texte, Fotos, Videos, Grafiken, Hörfunkbeiträge und andere Formate. Als international tätige Agentur berichtet dpa in sieben Sprachen. Rund 1000 Journalistinnen und Journalisten arbeiten von rund 150 Standorten im In- und Ausland aus. Gesellschafter der dpa sind rund 170 deutsche Medienunternehmen. Die dpa-Redaktion arbeitet nach den im dpa-Statut festgelegten Grundsätzen: unabhängig von Weltanschauungen, Wirtschaftsunternehmen oder Regierungen.

Die dpa-IT Services GmbH ist ein Tochterunternehmen der Deutschen Presse-Agentur (dpa) und stellt die interne IT der gesamten dpa Gruppe weltweit zur Verfügung. Unser Kompetenzspektrum umfasst unter anderem Arbeitsplatztechnologien, Telefonie- und Videokonferenzsysteme, eine Tool-Landschaft rund um Kommunikation und Kollaboration, Betrieb mehrerer Rechenzentren und Softwareentwicklung. Mit deiner Fachexpertise bereitest du mutig das Feld für begeisternde Lösungen. Ein wertschätzendes Arbeitsklima und Gestaltungsspielräume gehen bei uns Hand in Hand mit abwechslungsreichen Aufgaben.

Wir in der dpa IT suchen zum nächstmöglichen Zeitpunkt an unserem Standort in Hamburg oder Berlin einen Junior AI-Engineer (m/w/d) in Vollzeit (38,5 Stunden), der unser neu aufgebautes AI-Team verstärkt.

Der Job + Die Verantwortung


Du entwickelst, testest und optimierst AI-Applikationen für verschiedene (insbesondere redaktionelle) Anwendungsfälle und begleitest diese vom PoC bis zur Produktion
Du arbeitest eng mit Redakteuren, Produktteams und Developern zusammen, damit sich die AI-Anwendungen an Nutzerbedürfnissen und Geschäftszielen orientieren
Als Mitglied des AI-Teams definierst du methodische und technische Standards zur Umsetzung von AI-Use-Cases, um eine nachhaltige und effiziente Entwicklung zu gewährleisten
Du überwachst und analysierst die Performance der Anwendungen und identifizierst Verbesserungspotenzial
Du hältst Dich über die neuesten Innovationen im Bereich Machine Learning und Natural Language Processing auf dem Laufenden und trägst dazu bei, dass wir generative KI-Modelle kontinuierlich hinsichtlich Genauigkeit, Skalierbarkeit und Kosteneffizienz optimal nutzen können
Du tauschst Dein Wissen mit anderen aus und schulst andere in Best Practices
Du orientierst Dich in Deiner Arbeit an den dpa KI-Richtlinien und gibst Impulse zu deren kontinuierlichen Weiterentwicklung
Du arbeitest gern auch mal in Berlin oder Hamburg mit unterschiedlichen Kolleginnen und Kollegen vor Ort zusammen


Du + Deine Stärken


Du hast ein Studium im Bereich Informatik, Data Science, Naturwissenschaften oder einer ähnlichen Fachrichtung erfolgreich abgeschlossen oder stehst kurz vor dem Abschluss
Du hast bereits mit Large Language Models gearbeitet und/oder bist motiviert, Dich mit Themen wie Prompt Engineering, RAG, Fine-Tuning & Co. vertraut zu machen
Du hast Grundkenntnisse in Python oder einer anderen relevanten Programmiersprache (z. B. Java)
Du hast idealerweise erste Erfahrungen mit Cloud-Umgebungen, bevorzugt AWS, gesammelt
Du bringst analytische Fähigkeiten und Problemlösungskompetenz mit
Du kommunizierst gerne und trägst zur effektiven Zusammenarbeit mit fachübergreifenden Teams bei
Erfahrung in der Medienbranche ist von Vorteil, aber keine Voraussetzung
Du sprichst Deutsch und englisch auf einem sehr guten (C1, fachkundige Sprachkenntnisse) Niveau


Wir + Unsere Kultur


Fast alle Medien in Deutschland sind dpa-Kunden. Du trägst mit Deiner Arbeit zur Verbreitung eines unabhängigen, seriösen und vielfältigen Nachrichten-Journalismus und zu einer informierten Gesellschaft bei
Wir bieten eine eigenverantwortliche Tätigkeit mit viel Gestaltungsfreiraum und Entwicklungsmöglichkeiten
Wir bieten 13,8 Gehälter und mindestens 30 Urlaubstage plus 7 zusätzliche freie Tage bei einer Arbeitszeit von 38,5 Stunden/Woche
Du hast Möglichkeiten, mobil zu arbeiten und so Dein Privat- und Arbeitsleben flexibel und zeitgemäß vereinbaren
Wachse mit uns: Mit Fort- und Weiterbildungen fördern wir Deine fachliche und persönliche Entwicklung
Unsere Standorte in Hamburg und Berlin sind zentral gelegen
Show more

Mit deiner Fachexpertise bereitest du mutig das Feld für begeisternde Lösungen. Ein wertschätzendes Arbeitsklima und Gestaltungsspielräume gehen bei uns Hand in Hand mit abwechslungsreichen Aufgaben.

Wir in der dpa IT suchen zum nächstmöglichen Zeitpunkt an unserem Standort in Hamburg oder Berlin einen Junior AI-Engineer (m/w/d) in Vollzeit (38,5 Stunden), der unser neu aufgebautes AI-Team verstärkt.

Der Job + Die Verantwortung

  • Du entwickelst, testest und optimierst AI-Applikationen für verschiedene (insbesondere redaktionelle) Anwendungsfälle und begleitest diese vom PoC bis zur Produktion
  • Du arbeitest eng mit Redakteuren, Produktteams und Developern zusammen, damit sich die AI-Anwendungen an Nutzerbedürfnissen und Geschäftszielen orientieren
  • Als Mitglied des AI-Teams definierst du methodische und technische Standards zur Umsetzung von AI-Use-Cases, um eine nachhaltige und effiziente Entwicklung zu gewährleisten
  • Du überwachst und analysierst die Performance der Anwendungen und identifizierst Verbesserungspotenzial
  • Du hältst Dich über die neuesten Innovationen im Bereich Machine Learning und Natural Language Processing auf dem Laufenden und trägst dazu bei, dass wir generative KI-Modelle kontinuierlich hinsichtlich Genauigkeit, Skalierbarkeit und Kosteneffizienz optimal nutzen können
  • Du tauschst Dein Wissen mit anderen aus und schulst andere in Best Practices
  • Du orientierst Dich in Deiner Arbeit an den dpa KI-Richtlinien und gibst Impulse zu deren kontinuierlichen Weiterentwicklung
  • Du arbeitest gern auch mal in Berlin oder Hamburg mit unterschiedlichen Kolleginnen und Kollegen vor Ort zusammen

Du + Deine Stärken

  • Du hast ein Studium im Bereich Informatik, Data Science, Naturwissenschaften oder einer ähnlichen Fachrichtung erfolgreich abgeschlossen oder stehst kurz vor dem Abschluss
  • Du hast bereits mit Large Language Models gearbeitet und/oder bist motiviert, Dich mit Themen wie Prompt Engineering, RAG, Fine-Tuning & Co. vertraut zu machen
  • Du hast Grundkenntnisse in Python oder einer anderen relevanten Programmiersprache (z. B. Java)
  • Du hast idealerweise erste Erfahrungen mit Cloud-Umgebungen, bevorzugt AWS, gesammelt
  • Du bringst analytische Fähigkeiten und Problemlösungskompetenz mit
  • Du kommunizierst gerne und trägst zur effektiven Zusammenarbeit mit fachübergreifenden Teams bei
  • Erfahrung in der Medienbranche ist von Vorteil, aber keine Voraussetzung
  • Du sprichst Deutsch und englisch auf einem sehr guten (C1, fachkundige Sprachkenntnisse) Niveau

Wir + Unsere Kultur

  • Fast alle Medien in Deutschland sind dpa-Kunden. Du trägst mit Deiner Arbeit zur Verbreitung eines unabhängigen, seriösen und vielfältigen Nachrichten-Journalismus und zu einer informierten Gesellschaft bei
  • Wir bieten eine eigenverantwortliche Tätigkeit mit viel Gestaltungsfreiraum und Entwicklungsmöglichkeiten
  • Wir bieten 13,8 Gehälter und mindestens 30 Urlaubstage plus 7 zusätzliche freie Tage bei einer Arbeitszeit von 38,5 Stunden/Woche
  • Du hast Möglichkeiten, mobil zu arbeiten und so Dein Privat- und Arbeitsleben flexibel und zeitgemäß vereinbaren
  • Wachse mit uns: Mit Fort- und Weiterbildungen fördern wir Deine fachliche und persönliche Entwicklung
  • Unsere Standorte in Hamburg und Berlin sind zentral gelegen

Title: Junior Entwickler (m/w/d)
Description:
Du bist auf der Suche nach einer spannenden und abwechslungsreichen Tätigkeit im Bereich Entwicklung und Automatisierung?

Du hast bereits Erfahrung im Bereich Programmierung sammeln können und großes Interesse an Entwicklung von Automatisierungsprozessen. Du bist bereit, deine technischen Fähigkeiten und dein Know-how in einem Umfeld zu entfalten, das Innovation und Dynamik täglich lebt - Dann bist du bei uns genau richtig! Wir sind ein innovatives Tech-Startup in Berlin mit einem dynamischen Team, das die Grenzen von Technologie und Kreativität optimiert. Unsere Expertise umfasst unter anderem Bereiche wie RPA, KI und IPaaS. Wir sind mehr als nur ein weiteres Tech-Unternehmen; wir sind eine Bewegung, die zur Disruption inspiriert und Unternehmen dabei aktiv fördert und unterstützt, ihre Arbeitsweisen effektiv zu transformieren. In enger Zusammenarbeit mit unseren Kunden entwickeln wir maßgeschneiderte Digitalisierungsstrategien und implementieren IT-Lösungen, die nicht nur den heutigen Anforderungen entsprechen, sondern auch die Arbeitswelt von morgen prägen. Bei deefinity steht alles im Zeichen der Innovation und des Erreichens außergewöhnlicher Erfolge.

Deine Aufgaben als Teil unseres Teams:


Entwicklung: Du entwirfst, entwickelst und implementierst IT-Lösungen zur Automatisierung von Geschäftsprozessen.
Interdisziplinäre Zusammenarbeit: Du arbeitest eng mit unterschiedlichen Fachbereichen zusammen, um die Anforderungen an die Automatisierung zu verstehen und effektive Lösungen zu entwickeln.
Qualitätssicherung: Du führst Tests durch, behebst Fehler und optimierst, um eine hohe Qualität und Effizienz sicherzustellen.
Prozessdokumentation: Du unterstützt dein Team, indem du an Prozessaufnahmegesprächen teilnimmst und diese dokumentierst.
Persönliche Entwicklung: Du wirst von erfahrenen Entwicklern lernen und konstruktives Feedback erhalten, um Dich weiterzuentwickeln.


Requirements

Das bringst du mit :


Sprachen: Mindestens gute Deutsch- (C1) und Englischkenntnisse (C1)
Ausbildung: Universitäts- oder Fachhochschulabschluss mit Schwerpunkt Wirtschaftsinformatik, Informatik, Mathematik, Physik oder ein vergleichbarer Abschluss
Engagement: Stark ausgeprägtes agiles Mindset, eigener Drive neues zu lernen
Erfahrung: Gute Kenntnisse im Umgang mit objektorientierten Programmiersprachen oder Automatisierungslösungen
Arbeitsweise: Verständnis für komplexe Prozesse und analytische sowie strukturierte Arbeitsweise
Einstellung: Teamgeist, Verantwortungsbewusstsein und Spaß an projektbezogener Arbeit


Pluspunkte:


Idealerweise Kenntnisse in einer oder mehreren objektorientierter Programmiersprachen (z.B. C#, Python, Java...)
Erfahrungen mit Skriptsprachen (z.B. VBS, JS) sowie Build-/Deployment Tools (z.B. Azure)
Kenntnisse im Bereich Robotic Process Automation (UiPath, BluePrism, AutomationAnywhere, PowerAutomate, Robocorp)
Kenntnisse moderner Architekturkonzepte, Design Patterns und agiler Softwareentwicklung (Scrum, Kanban)


Benefits


Flex-work: Wir schätzen Deine Work-Life-Balance! Genieße unsere flexiblen Arbeitszeiten (Gleitzeitkonto), unser Hybrid-Arbeitsmodell mit 3 Tagen im Office und 2 Tagen Home-Office, und die Möglichkeit, Dir freie Tage zu gönnen.
Salary & More: Bei uns bekommst Du ein attraktives Gehaltspaket, das durch Benefits wie Bonuszahlungen, Jobticket für Deine tägliche Mobilität und eine Urban Sports Club-Mitgliedschaft für Deine Fitness und Freizeit ergänzt wird.
Personal & Professional Development: Entwickle Dich kontinuierlich weiter - ob interne Coachings oder externe Weiterbildungen – Du bekommst ständig neue Chancen, Dich weiterzuentwickeln. Unsere Trainingspfade sind auf Deine Rolle und Deine persönlichen Interessen abgestimmt. Unsere Angebote umfassen Lunch & Learn Sessions, Work-Life-Balance Coachings, Soft Skill Trainings, positionsspezifische Workshops, Zertifizierungen und Mentoring Programme – alles perfekt auf Deine Rolle und Interessen abgestimmt.
Work-Life-Balance: Wir bieten Dir 30 Urlaubstage, Möglichkeiten für Workations, Sabbaticals und Teilzeitoptionen. Damit findest Du den perfekten Ausgleich zwischen Beruf und Freizeit.
Team Feeling: Bei uns steht das Miteinander im Vordergrund. Wir fördern eine vielfältige und inklusive Unternehmenskultur, feiern gemeinsame Erfolge, und stärken unser Teamgefühl durch regelmäßige Team-Events, Team-Meetings und Team-Lunches.
Empowering Company Culture: Arbeite in einem zukunftsorientierten Unternehmen mit modernem Office im Herzen Berlins. Bei uns kannst Du Deine Ideen einbringen und umsetzen, dank flacher Hierarchien und schnellen Entscheidungswegen.
Broad Range of Projects: Tauche ein in eine Welt spannender, vielseitiger Projekte, die nicht nur Deine Verantwortungsbereiche erweitern, sondern auch sinnvoll und erfüllend sind. Bei uns findest Du Arbeit, die Sinn macht.
Fast Application Process: Erwarte einen schnellen Bewerbungsprozess mit umgehendem Feedback und regelmäßigen Status-Updates. Wir halten Dich auf dem Laufenden und schätzen Deine Zeit und Dein Engagement.
Warm Welcome & Structured Onboarding: Starte durch mit unserem strukturierten Onboarding-Prozess, inklusive Mentoring, Briefings und Welcome-Days. Wir sorgen dafür, dass Du Dich von Anfang an als Teil des Teams fühlst.

Title: Senior Machine Learning Engineer (MRI)
Description:
Position Overview:

We are seeking a Senior MRI Scientist with expertise in Machine Learning to drive innovation in MRI data acquisition, analysis, and interpretation. This role involves developing machine learning models to enhance MRI performance, collaborating with cross-functional teams, and improving diagnostic outcomes.




Key Responsibilities:

Lead the development of machine learning models for MRI image reconstruction, denoising, and artifact reduction.
Apply AI for MRI data analysis (e.g., segmentation, classification, quantitative imaging).
Collaborate with clinical researchers and engineers to integrate AI into MRI workflows.
Design novel MRI techniques to accelerate scanning and improve image quality.
Stay current with advancements in machine learning and MRI; contribute to publications and conferences.




Qualifications:

PhD in Biomedical Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Computer Science, or related field.
3+ years of experience in MRI research; 3+ years in machine learning applications.
Proficiency in Python, TensorFlow, or PyTorch; experience in medical image processing.
Strong background in MRI physics and image reconstruction.
Proven track record of scientific publications and experience with clinical applications.
You have strong coding skills in Python and C/C++
You have experience with MR pulse sequence development and imaging optimization




Preferred:

Experience with 3D medical imaging, high-performance computing, and GPU-based training.
Familiarity with FDA regulations and MRI hardware.




Benefits:

Comprehensive salary
Long term incentives
25+ days holiday
Clear development pathway




If you are interested in this role then be sure to contact Aimee Greatorex, a specialist AI Recruiter who will discuss the opportunity with you in detail. She will be more than happy to answer any questions relating to the industry and the potential for your career growth.




The conversation can also progress further to discussing other opportunities, which are also available right now or will be imminently becoming available. This position has been highly popular, and it is likely that it will close prematurely. We recommend applying as soon as possible to avoid disappointment.




Aimee Greatorex

Recruitment Consultant – Barrington James

Email: agreatorex@barringtonjames.com

Title: AI Research Engineer - Reinforcement Learning
Description:
Who we are




Helsing is a defence AI company. Our mission is to protect our democracies. We aim to achieve technological leadership, so that open societies can continue to make sovereign decisions and control their ethical standards.




As democracies, we believe we have a special responsibility to be thoughtful about the development and deployment of powerful technologies like AI. We take this responsibility seriously.




We are an ambitious and committed team of engineers, AI specialists and customer-facing programme managers. We are looking for mission-driven people to join our European teams – and apply their skills to solve the most complex and impactful problems. We embrace an open and transparent culture that welcomes healthy debates on the use of technology in defence, its benefits, and its ethical implications.




The role




At Helsing we deliver AI-based capabilities and the enabling foundation that allow machines to perceive and assist human decision-making. You will have the unique opportunity to shape AI capabilities in one of the most challenging sectors, where high generalisation capabilities need to be paired with hardware constraints and robustness against adversarial attacks.




You will be part of a team focused on reinforcement learning, where you will design, train and deploy agents in complex multi-agent environments.




The day-to-day




You will contribute to our reinforcement learning stack by implementing, improving and extending the current state of the art in multi-agent reinforcement learning.




You will contribute to projects and will collaborate with people across several teams and backgrounds.




You should apply if you




Hold MSc in machine learning with a speciality in either reinforcement learning, multi-agent systems, automation and control, or robotics.
Have excellent communication skills and the ability to report and present research findings clearly and efficiently both internally and externally
Are passionate about keeping up to date with current research and enjoy reimplementing / extending papers on state of the art Deep Learning-based approaches
Possess solid software engineering skills, writing clean and well-structured code in Python and/or languages like Rust, Java, or modern C++, and experience deploying AI software to production including testing, QA, and monitoring




Note: We operate at an intersection where women, as well as other minority groups, are systemically under-represented. We encourage you to apply even if you don’t meet all the listed qualifications; ability and impact cannot be summarised in a few bullet points.




Nice to have




PhD in reinforcement learning, multi-agent systems, automation and control, robotics, or related fields and have authored publications in top-tier journals and conferences (eg, NeurIPS, ICML, ICLR, AAMAS).
Experience with large-scale RL training.
Experience modelling and training multi-agent controllers using state-of-the-art tools and techniques.
Experience deploying AI software to production including testing, quality assurance, and monitoring




Join Helsing and work with world-leading experts in their fields




Helsing’s work is important. You’ll be directly contributing to the protection of democratic countries while balancing both ethical and geopolitical concerns.
The work is unique. We operate in a domain that has highly unusual technical requirements and constraints, and where robustness, safety, and ethical considerations are vital. You will face unique Engineering and AI challenges that make a meaningful impact in the world.
Our work frequently takes us right up to the state of the art in technical innovation, be it reinforcement learning, distributed systems, generative AI, or deployment infrastructure. The defence industry is entering the most exciting phase of the technological development curve. Advances in our field of world are not incremental: Helsing is part of, and often leading, historic leaps forward.
In our domain, success is a matter of order-of-magnitude improvements and novel capabilities. This means we take bets, aim high, and focus on big opportunities. Despite being a relatively young company, Helsing has already been selected for multiple significant government contracts.
We actively encourage healthy, proactive, and diverse debate internally about what we do and how we choose to do it. Teams and individual engineers are trusted (and encouraged) to practise responsible autonomy and critical thinking, and to focus on outcomes, not conformity. At Helsing you will have a say in how we (and you!) work, the opportunity to engage on what does and doesn’t work, and to take ownership of aspects of our culture that you care deeply about.




What we offer




A focus on outcomes, not time-tracking
Competitive compensation and stock options
Relocation support
Social and education allowances
Regular company events and all-hands to bring together employees as one team across Europe
A hands-on onboarding program (affectionately labelled “AI-duction”), in which you will be familiarising yourself with our tools and ML pipelines used across the company. This is your opportunity to learn our tech stack, explore the company, and learn how we get things done - all whilst working with other AI and engineering teams from day one




Helsing is an equal opportunities employer. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, religion, sexual orientation, age, marital status, disability or gender identity. Please do not submit personal data revealing racial or ethnic origin, political opinions, religious or philosophical beliefs, trade union membership, data concerning your health, or data concerning your sexual orientation.




Helsing's Candidate Privacy and Confidentiality Regime can be found here.
